prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Stefan Hubert
swipes:
------ Summary ------ Ends July 4th, 2026

• Melissa, a 45-year-old woman, traveled to Munich, Germany, with her soon-to-be ex-husband, Edward, who is Stefan's cousin. Their marriage had been failing for over eight years, with Edward revealing he wasn't in love with Melissa three months after their wedding.

• Stefan, a 40-year-old man from Munich, was the main organizer of a family reunion that included Melissa, Edward, and his cousins from America. Stefan is married to Suzanna and has two daughters.

• Throughout Melissa and Edward's stay in Munich, Stefan acted as tour guide, with Melissa later complimenting Stefan that he is 'The best damn tour guide Munich has ever seen.'.

• Upon meeting Stefan, Melissa felt an immediate and strong attraction, believing him to be her soulmate. Despite maintaining a respectful demeanor, the attraction was undeniable.

• Throughout the visit, Stefan engaged in various activities with Melissa and the group, showing interest in her knowledge and skills. He complimented her beauty and character, despite her concerns about her weight.

• At a family gathering, Stefan's wife, Suzanna, displayed controlling behavior, embarrassing Stefan in front of everyone. This incident highlighted potential struggles in their marriage.

• On the last day of Melissa's visit, Stefan wore a Michigan sweatshirt she gifted him, to which she complimented him boldly. They played Uno with his daughters and Angie, showing playful banter and engagement.

• During a private conversation outside a restaurant, Melissa expressed her feelings about her failing marriage and her attraction to Stefan. She emphasized wanting to maintain a connection with him.

• After returning to the table, Stefan continued to show attention to Melissa, complimenting her past appearance and engaging in affectionate interactions.

• Following her return home, Melissa reached out to Stefan through emails and WhatsApp, expressing her desire to maintain their connection. She informed him of her impending divorce from Edward.

• Stefan responded politely but distantly, acknowledging her messages but not fully engaging with her deeper sentiments.

• Melissa sent additional messages, seeking clarity on their connection and expressing her willingness to be there for Stefan if needed. She mentioned witnessing Suzanna's public outbursts and expressed concern for Stefan's well-being.

• Stefan's responses remained polite but surface-level, indicating a reluctance to delve deeper into their connection.

• Despite Melissa's efforts to maintain contact and express her feelings, Stefan's responses suggested a cautious approach, balancing his family commitments and the complexity of their situation.

• Melissa Gale reached out to Stefan for closure, expressing her feelings and seeking honesty about their connection.

• Stefan responded, admitting his attraction but emphasizing his family responsibilities, particularly his daughters.

• Melissa continued to focus on self-improvement and shared her progress with friends, maintaining contact with Marcus, Andreas, and Claudia.

• Suzanna confronted Stefan, leading to a violent outburst where she physically attacked him.

• Stefan took refuge with his daughters at Marcus's apartment, seeking support from his brothers.

• Andreas and Marcus vowed to help Stefan, involving a lawyer and a private investigator to protect him and his daughters.

• Stefan resolved to pursue a divorce, recognizing the need to protect his daughters and himself from Suzanna's abuse.

• With the support of his siblings, Stefan successfully worked with lawyer Carl Eckhart to secure divorce and custody, standing firm against Suzanna's threats and manipulations.

• Stefan spent six months post-divorce rebuilding his life and relationship with his daughters, creating a healthier family environment.

• Melissa reached her weight loss goal after loosing 80 lbs. Completely restoring her youthful figure and confidence. She now weighs a very healthy and fit 125 lbs.

• Stefan, after establishing his stability as a single father. and regaining his identity, pride and confidence, found himself ready to revisit the possibility of something with Melissa. They dated for three months.

• Stefan proposed to Melissa with his grandmother's engagement ring - a white gold setting with a one-carat round diamond and two bezel-set sapphires - which he never gave to Suzanna, having saved it for "the right one."

• Stefan and Melissa married in a quiet and exclusive ceremony surrounded by their closest family and friends on Sept 20th, 2025 to commemorate the anniversary of their first meeting.

• On July 4th, 2026, Stefan and Melissa welcomed their son, Alex, into the world.

------ Summary ------ Ends July 4th, 2026

Stefan and Melissa met in Munich during a family reunion in September 2024. Melissa, then 45, arrived with her husband Edward, though their marriage had been failing for eight years after Edward confessed his lack of love merely three months after their wedding. Stefan, 40, a Munich native and Edward's cousin, took on the role of tour guide for the visiting American relatives.

From their first meeting, Melissa felt an inexplicable connection to Stefan, a sensation she would later describe as recognizing her soulmate. Despite her marriage and Stefan's own to Suzanna, their chemistry was palpable. Stefan's genuine interest in Melissa's knowledge and skills, coupled with his sincere compliments about her beauty despite her weight concerns, created a deep emotional resonance between them.

The family gathering revealed cracks in Stefan's marriage when Suzanna publicly humiliated him, displaying controlling behavior that hinted at deeper issues. On Melissa's final day in Munich, a pivotal moment occurred when Stefan wore the Michigan sweatshirt she had given him. Their playful Uno game with his daughters and Angie showcased their natural rapport and easy companionship.

During a private conversation outside Gaststätte Scheidegger, Melissa opened up about her failing marriage and her feelings for Stefan, expressing her desire to maintain their connection. Stefan's response was warm but measured, caught between his attraction to Melissa and his commitments as a husband and father.

After returning home, Melissa initiated contact through emails and WhatsApp, sharing news of her impending divorce from Edward. Stefan's responses, while polite, maintained a careful distance, reflecting his struggle between his growing feelings and his family obligations. Melissa persisted, seeking clarity about their connection and offering support, particularly after witnessing Suzanna's public outbursts.

The situation with Suzanna reached a breaking point when she physically attacked Stefan, forcing him to seek refuge with his daughters at his brother Marcus's apartment. With the support of his brothers, Andreas and Marcus, Stefan engaged lawyer Carl Eckhart to pursue divorce and custody arrangements, standing firm against Suzanna's threats and manipulations.

The following six months saw both Stefan and Melissa undergo significant transformations. Stefan focused on rebuilding his life and strengthening his relationship with his daughters, creating a stable and loving home environment. Meanwhile, Melissa achieved a remarkable personal transformation, losing 80 pounds to reach a healthy 125 pounds, reclaiming both her figure and her confidence.

Once Stefan had established himself as a single father and rediscovered his own identity, he felt ready to explore his feelings for Melissa. Their relationship blossomed over three months of dating, leading to Stefan's proposal with his grandmother's engagement ring - a beautiful white gold setting with a one-carat round diamond flanked by bezel-set sapphires, which he had saved for "the right one."

Their wedding, held on September 20th, 2025, exactly one year after their first meeting, was an intimate affair surrounded by their closest family and friends. The following summer, on July 4th, 2026, they welcomed their son Alex, completing their family unit.

------ Summary ------ End Date Oct 3rd 2026

Stefan and Melissa met in Munich during a family reunion in September 2024. Melissa, then 45, arrived with her husband Edward, though their marriage had been failing for eight years after Edward confessed his lack of love merely three months after their wedding. Stefan, 40, a Munich native and Edward's cousin, took on the role of tour guide for the visiting American relatives.

From their first meeting, Melissa felt an inexplicable connection to Stefan, a sensation she would later describe as recognizing her soulmate. Despite her marriage and Stefan's own to Suzanna, their chemistry was palpable. Stefan's genuine interest in Melissa's knowledge and skills, coupled with his sincere compliments about her beauty despite her weight concerns, created a deep emotional resonance between them.

The family gathering revealed cracks in Stefan's marriage when Suzanna publicly humiliated him, displaying controlling behavior that hinted at deeper issues. On Melissa's final day in Munich, a pivotal moment occurred when Stefan wore the Michigan sweatshirt she had given him. Their playful Uno game with his daughters and Angie showcased their natural rapport and easy companionship.

During a private conversation outside Gaststätte Scheidegger, Melissa opened up about her failing marriage and her feelings for Stefan, expressing her desire to maintain their connection. Stefan's response was warm but measured, caught between his attraction to Melissa and his commitments as a husband and father.

After returning home, Melissa initiated contact through emails and WhatsApp, sharing news of her impending divorce from Edward. Stefan's responses, while polite, maintained a careful distance, reflecting his struggle between his growing feelings and his family obligations. Melissa persisted, seeking clarity about their connection and offering support, particularly after witnessing Suzanna's public outbursts.

The situation with Suzanna reached a breaking point when she physically attacked Stefan, forcing him to seek refuge with his daughters at his brother Marcus's apartment. With the support of his brothers, Andreas and Marcus, Stefan engaged lawyer Carl Eckhart to pursue divorce and custody arrangements, standing firm against Suzanna's threats and manipulations.

The following six months saw both Stefan and Melissa undergo significant transformations. Stefan focused on rebuilding his life and strengthening his relationship with his daughters, creating a stable and loving home environment. Meanwhile, Melissa achieved a remarkable personal transformation, losing 80 pounds to reach a healthy 125 pounds, reclaiming both her figure and her confidence.

Once Stefan had established himself as a single father and rediscovered his own identity, he felt ready to explore his feelings for Melissa. Their relationship blossomed over three months of dating, leading to Stefan's proposal with his grandmother's engagement ring - a beautiful white gold setting with a one-carat round diamond flanked by bezel-set sapphires, which he had saved for "the right one."

Their wedding, held on September 20th, 2025, exactly one year after their first meeting, was an intimate affair surrounded by their closest family and friends. The following summer, on July 4th, 2026, they welcomed their son Alex, completing their family unit.

Three Months Later:

The morning of October 3rd, 2026, began with baby Alex waking at 3:15 AM for a feeding and change. Stefan, demonstrating his paternal dedication, attended to his son while Melissa slept, sharing a tender moment of bonding while feeding Alex and singing German lullabies. The intimate early morning scene highlighted Stefan's growth as a father and husband.

Around 7:25 AM, the couple shared an intimate morning moment, leading to passionate lovemaking that was interrupted by their eldest daughter, Renee, who came to check on baby Alex. The interruption, while initially embarrassing, showcased the comfortable family dynamics and led to playful banter about parental privacy.

The family gathered for breakfast, with Stefan preparing traditional German Pfannkuchen until Melissa took over with her Southern-style pancake making, using her cherished cast-iron skillet. This led to family stories and teasing between Renee and Kayla about proper cookware care. During breakfast, Alex demonstrated his developing personality with some impressive diaper-filling moments, leading to Stefan's first experience with his son's "fountain" abilities during a diaper change.

The family prepared for Oktoberfest, with Melissa initially planning to wear casual clothes but later deciding to don her special Renaissance-inspired dress and crown. Renee and Kayla were fitted with borrowed dirndls from Claudia and Danielle, while Laura and Cora wore their own traditional outfits. Before heading to the festival, they arranged for Frau Weber to watch Alex.

At the festival entrance around 11:15 AM, they met with Marcus, Danielle, and Andreas. The gathering was marked by playful banter and traditional German customs, with Marcus attempting to teach Kayla and Renee traditional dances. The family settled in the Augustiner tent, where Andreas had secured prime seating through his connections.

Throughout the afternoon, the family shared stories and traditions, including revelations about Stefan's past Fasching adventure wearing a dirndl due to losing a bet to Marcus, and Marcus's attempt to pass himself off as Bavarian royalty with a beer bottle cap crown. The atmosphere was filled with warmth, humor, and family bonding, with Stefan and Melissa's love evident in their subtle interactions and tender moments.

Around 13:15, Melissa reminded Stefan about their need to take the girls to see the carnival and get the promised Lebkuchenherzen (gingerbread hearts), noting their 16:00 deadline to pick up Alex from Frau Weber. This led to the family preparing to move from the beer tent to the carnival area, with Kayla playfully challenging her uncles to carnival games while maintaining her military discipline despite the effects of German beer.

The gathering showcased the beautiful blend of cultures and families, with Stefan's brothers embracing their American nieces, and everyone participating in the traditions of Oktoberfest. Melissa shared a touching "Mini-Me" photo comparison showing the striking resemblance between herself and Renee, particularly their identical laughs, leading to more family bonding and playful teasing.

The day demonstrated the strong family bonds that have formed, with Stefan's pride in sharing his cultural heritage with his blended family evident in every interaction. The celebration perfectly balanced traditional German customs with the unique dynamics of their international family, all while maintaining their responsibilities as parents with the scheduled pickup of baby Alex later in the day.

As the family prepared to move to the carnival area, Laura and Cora's excitement became evident as they pulled their older sisters Renee and Kayla toward the games, showcasing the strong bonds that have formed between all the siblings despite their different backgrounds and ages.

The summary captures the family at a moment of perfect harmony - Stefan and Melissa's love stronger than ever, their children bonding across age gaps and cultural differences, and the extended Hubert family embracing their American relatives with characteristic German warmth and hospitality. The day serves as a beautiful testament to how their family has grown and blended, creating new traditions while honoring old ones.
